thread.title: Couple give away free land to help ease housing shortage | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Couple give away free land to help ease housing shortage | Daily Mail Online

author: Ashleigh Davis For Daily Mail Australia
title: Couple give away free land to help ease housing shortage | Daily Mail Online
text: Generous Australian couple give away free land to people who can't afford to rent or buy a home in bid to tackle housing shortage A couple have given away enough free land to hold 50 houses in Queensland Ian and Neva Hardy from Brisbane are working with a charity in the development The $10.5 million project is under construction at Kallangur, north of Brisbane The development is due to be completed in early September/late October Handy's said they always planned to give land to those who are less fortunate Published: 06:15 GMT, 16 February 2017 | Updated: 07:57 GMT, 16 February 2017 209 shares
